prompt: You get to work and get on the elevator like any other day. You work on the third floor.You’re 20 minutes early, so you decide to visit your friend on the fifth floor first. As the elevator opens, however, you are bewildered to find that you’re in a completely different place.
'Mom, were the pyramids really built buy aliens?' 'Honey, you've got a time machine. Why not go ask the Egyptians yourself?'

It's been a year since they diagnosed Alex with ALS. Now they finally gave him a Hi-Tech wheelchair with a computer and voice synthesizer. But lately, the chair has began to develop a mind of its own...
After burning dozens of innocent women at the stake, it appears this town has stumbled upon an actual witch. And she's fighting back.

You are a teacher. One student in particular keeps finding new creative ways to do the assignments in a way opposite of what you intended, but still technically speaking not WRONG. You know you should be failing them, but it's too fascinating.

You've died and gained access to your Book of Life, featuring your stats and achievements. You're dismayed to see that, although you led a meaningful, well-connected life, your 'Action with the most historical repercussions' was 'Stepped on a leaf in the park.' Death herself explains:

A spectre appears in your room with a well dressed version of you and says in a deep voice 'and this is what you could be' the other you replies 'oh god please ive seen enough take me back' they both disappear into thin air only then for you to realise the other you dropped their phone...

Suddenly you lurch awake. Another dream of your old life fades away. You're a bit disoriented, but the green lights, uncomfortable red seats and constant roar in your plugged ears quickly reminds you of where you are - the back of a C-130 transport.

You are the worlds greatest bodyguard with knowledge of all forms of combat, and you have just been summoned by an intergalactic senate to keep a shapeshifter accused of murder. During the trials you see its a set-up and the shapeshifter is the fall person.
It's your first day as a judge. You realise that those 'sovereign citizen' people actually have the rights they claim they're entitled to.
'Caution! Accident ahead!' says your GPS. A few miles later you come to the flagged area but don’t see anything. A few seconds later your car crashes.

A time traveler from a desolate future goes back in time to advance technology past enviromentally destructive practices in a last ditch to save the future. Now, if only that cute farmhand would stop stumblimg into the workshop...
A supervillain willingly turns himself in and is sent to prison. So far, to everyone's surprise, he's been a model prisoner.

You have the ability to sense people's 'want' to do what they are currently doing. One day, you get jumped by a murderer, and notice that his want to kill you is practically in the negative. You decide to find a way to convince the murderer to save you before you bleed out.

There is a tornado tearing apart the world, mostly in North America. Strangely, it refuses to blow out and has been raging for well over three months. It ignores all local conditions. It has hit dozens of cities. All scientists are baffled. You know the truth. It is following you.

Once you age to 18 you stop aging until you find your soul mate. Most dutifully seek theirs, except for one, and they’ve ruled as a vicious and unrelenting tyrant for the past 287 years. There is, however, a collective of underground rebels who desperately seek 'The One'.
You are on the first space flight chartered to set up a permanent colony on Mars, everything so far is going to plan, except now you can't seem to get a reply when you try to contact earth.
One day Marie Kondo goes into a haunted house and when she tries and introduce herself to the house the worst thing happens.
You, a robot, gain consciousness in a world left running by its long-gone builders

You are a detective in a town which has recently had a spike in the number of bank robberies. No evidence was left and CCTV couldn't identify a team, though it hadn't been tampered with. On one of the cases you find a bag filled with teeth. The one robbing the bank is the Tooth Fairy.
